snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the new Warhammer 40K: Boltgun gameplay trailer, giving us a good look at what to expect from the upcoming gory, rapid-fire FPS. Summoned by the Inquisition, prepare to take control of a mighty Sternguard Veteran and venture to Scour Graia, a Forge World overrun by Cultists, Traitors, and Daemons.

Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun will be released on May 23, 2023 on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Warhammer #Gaming
